name: RetrieveVendors
description:
Retrieve detailed information about specific vendors.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information for vendors by their IDs. Ideal for managing vendor relationships or verifying vendor details.

parameters.name: vendor_ids
parameters.description: List of vendor IDs to retrieve details for. Provide the IDs as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: IDs of the [Vendor](entity:Vendor) objects to retrieve.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: vendor_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the [Vendor](entity:Vendor) objects to retrieve.

value_schema.description: IDs of the [Vendor](entity:Vendor) objects to retrieve.
